thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com
thread.title: Gary Searles

author: Gary Searles
title: Gary Searles
text: I found the DogVacay site when searching for a caregiver for our 8 yr old blind beagle, We were planning a month stay in Florida and were not familiar with or knowledgeable of any pet care facilities in the Largo area. Leaving our beagle in a private home seemed more personable and loving than boarding her in a traditional kennel. Being blind we felt she needed something more personable than a commercial kennel. We were very satisfied with her stay in a private home and felt she couldn't have received better care anywhere else. I am so glad I stumbled on the DogVacay website.
